question: Coinbase a top 100 app before Feb?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Coinbase is in the top 100 free iPhone apps by January 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market specifically refers to the Coinbase app. The position of the Coinbase Wallet app in the Apple App Store has no bearing on the resolution to this market.

The resolution source is the US iPhone App Store's "Top Free Apps" chart, viewable here: https://apps.apple.com/us/charts/iphone/top-free-apps/36.

question: Browns vs. Jets
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for December 28 at 8:15 PM ET:

If the Cleveland Browns win, the market will resolve to “Browns”.

If the New York Jets win, the market will resolve to “Jets”.

 If the game is not completed by January 4, 2024 (11:59 PM ET) or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NFL
events.description: This is a market group for NFL games happening on 2023-12-28

question: Will Haley beat DeSantis in Iowa?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Nikki Haley wins a greater number of votes than Ron DeSantis in the 2024 Republican Iowa caucuses. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no 2024 Republican Iowa caucuses take place, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be the Iowa Republican party, however an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting may suffice.

events.title: Will Haley beat DeSantis in Iowa?
events.description:

The resolution source for this market will be the Iowa Republican party, however an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting may suffice.

question: Another Ledger leak/exploit by Mar 31?
description:
This is a market on whether Ledger suffers a new leak or exploit between December 26, 2023, 12:00 PM ET and March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible sources.

question: Who's out first: Benjamin Netanyahu or Yahya Sinwar?
description:
This market will resolve to the name of the leader who leaves/is removed from power first.

This market will resolve to "Netanyahu" if Benjamin Netanyahu is out as the Prime Minister of Israel before Yahya Sinwar is out as leader of Hamas. This market will resolve to "Sinwar" if Yahya Sinwar is out as the leader of Hamas before Benjamin Netanyahu is out as the Prime Minister of Israel.

If both leaders remain in power uninterruptedly from December 26, 2023, through October 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Who's out first: Benjamin Netanyahu or Yahya Sinwar?
events.description:
This market will resolve to the name of the leader who leaves/is removed from power first.

This market will resolve to "Netanyahu" if Benjamin Netanyahu is out as the Prime Minister of Israel before Yahya Sinwar is out as leader of Hamas. This market will resolve to "Sinwar" if Yahya Sinwar is out as the leader of Hamas before Benjamin Netanyahu is out as the Prime Minister of Israel.

If both leaders remain in power uninterruptedly from December 26, 2023, through October 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: 2023-24 Detroit Pistons worst NBA team of all time?
description:
The worst NBA team in history with a typical 82-game record was the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers, with a record of 9-73 and a rounded win percentage of 0.110.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, at the conclusion of the 2023-24 NBA regular season the Detroit Pistons have a final win percentage less than the 1972-73 76ers'. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If they tie the 76ers win percentage, it will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes" - they must have a lower win percentage.

If it becomes guaranteed that the Pistons will have a lower win percentage than the 1972-73 76ers, this market may immediately resolve to "Yes." Likewise if it becomes guaranteed that the Pistons will have a higher win percentage than the 1972-73 76ers, this market may immediately resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA and a consensus of credible sources.

question: $Bitcoin (Hpos10i) all time high by Jan 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if $Bitcoin (HarryPotterObamaSonic10Inu) reaches a new all time high between December 28, 2023 ET and January 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/harrypotterobamasonic10inu-eth), specifically the All time high figure and date on the right box. If CoinGecko becomes unavailable or fails to update, a consensus of highly liquid sources will be used instead.

question: Netanyahu out by June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Benjamin Netanyahu ceases to be Prime Minister of Israel for any length of time between December 27, 2023, and June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Netanyahu ceases to be Prime Minister of Israel for any length of time within this market's timeframe, this market will immediately resolve to "Yes". This market will not resolve to "No" until its timeframe expires and Netanyahu has remained Prime Minister of Israel for the entire duration without interruption.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of the State of Israel, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.description:

If Netanyahu ceases to be Prime Minister of Israel for any length of time within this market's timeframe, this market will immediately resolve to "Yes". This market will not resolve to "No" until its timeframe expires and Netanyahu has remained Prime Minister of Israel for the entire duration without interruption.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of the State of Israel, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will a nuclear weapon detonate by June 30, 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a nuclear weapon detonates anywhere in the world between December 27, 2023, and June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

For the purpose of this market's resolution, any detonation of a nuclear weapon anywhere on the planet Earth will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution. This includes offensive usages, nuclear tests, and accidental detonations. Use/launch of a nuclear weapon that fails to detonate, a fake weapon that never detonates, or a dirty bomb that distributes radioactive material by means of a conventional explosion are not sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution of this market. Only a successful nuclear detonation will result in a "Yes" resolution. 

This market may resolve to "Yes" as soon as a nuclear detonation is confirmed by a preponderance of credible reporting. 

For the purpose of this market's resolution, determination as to whether a detonation was nuclear will be made by a preponderance of credible reporting.

events.title: Will a nuclear weapon detonate by...?
events.description: This is a market series over by when there will be a nuclear detonation anywhere in the world.

question: North Korea nuke by March 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Democratic People's Public of Korea (North Korea) detonates a nuclear device in any capacity by March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This includes offensive usages, nuclear tests, and accidental detonations. Use/launch of a nuclear weapon that fails to detonate, a fake weapon that never detonates, or a dirty bomb that distributes radioactive material by means of a conventional explosion are not sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution of this market. Only a successful nuclear detonation initiated by North Korea will result in a "Yes" resolution.

This market may resolve to "Yes" as soon as a nuclear detonation is confirmed by a preponderance of credible reporting.

For the purpose of this market's resolution, determination as to whether a detonation was nuclear will be made by a preponderance of credible reporting.
